title:
Stabilization of self-steepening optical solitons in a periodic
  PT-symmetric potential
abstract:
We numerically investigate the existence and stability dynamics of
self-steepening optical solitons in a periodic PT-symmetric potential.
  We show that self-steepening solitons of the modified nonlinear Schr\"odinger
(MNLS) equation undergo a position shift and amplitude increase during their
evolution in the MNLS equation. The stabilization of solitons by an external
potential is a challenging issue. This study demonstrates that the suppression
of both the amplitude increase and the position shift of self-steepening
solitons can be achieved by adding a periodic PT-symmetric potential to the
MNLS equation.
